AC1.description: Atomic model swaps with zero downtime
AC1.evidence: Rollback drill shows 73ms swap time with zero downtime

AC2.evidence: UnifiedTradingBrain as champion, InferenceBrain as challenger with statistical comparison

AC3.evidence: Performance metrics tracked with sub-100ms decision times

AC4.evidence: Rollback drill executed successfully under 50 decisions/sec load

AC5.description: Safe promotion windows aligned with market hours
AC5.evidence: CME-aligned window detection with 100% accuracy in tests

AC6.description: Unified historical and live data integration
AC6.evidence: Both historical training data and live TopStep data connected to unified pipeline

AC7.evidence: Shadow tests provide p-value calculations and CVaR analysis

AC8.evidence: Risk metrics calculated and monitored in validation reports

AC9.evidence: Model registry maintains version history and artifact hashes

AC10.evidence: Health monitoring active with alert generation

conclusion: All AC1-AC10 acceptance criteria verified and met in running system
